name: httpinvoke
description: A no-dependencies HTTP client library for browsers and Node.js with a promise-based or Node.js-style callback-based API to progress events, text and binary file upload and download, partial response body, request and response headers, status code.

scripts.test-browser: node ./node_modules/.bin/grunt compile && node ./dummyserver.js suggestopen && node ./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start;kill $(cat ./dummyserver.pid);rm ./dummyserver.pid
scripts.test-node: node ./node_modules/.bin/grunt compile && node ./dummyserver.js && node ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --watch && kill $(cat ./dummyserver.pid) && rm ./dummyserver.pid
